items.sentence: Tom certainly has a better understanding of this matter than I do.
I was surprised by how many people came to meet us at the airport.
Don\'t you think you\'ll be able to solve the problem by yourself?
I\'ve heard you play the viola and you\'re not very good, are you?
I half expected Tom to bring his own popcorn to the movie theater.
Three passengers were saved, but the remaining passengers drowned.
Tom and I went to the same high school. He was two years above me.
Tom and I went to the same high school. He was two years below me.
Can I talk to you for just a second about what happened in Boston?
When did you find out that Tom didn\'t want to go camping with us?
